item.title: General relativity and Cosmology
item.description: General Relativity and Gravity [gr-qc/9712019] Sean Caroll’s Lecture Notes on General Relativity Carroll, Lecture Notes on General Relativity Geroch, lecture course notes [0708.4231] TASI Lectures on the Cosmological Constant [0603249] The Cosmological Constant and the String Landscape Gibbon, Cambridge Part II Lecture Notes on General Relativity Cosmology and Inflation Kurki-Suonio, Cosmological Perturbation Theory [1404.2601] Inflation and String Theory [0503203] Particle Physics and Inflationary Cosmologyy Perepelitsa, Sakharov Conditions for Baryogenesis [0503195] Inflation and String Cosmology [0503203] Particle Physics and Inflationary Cosmology
